topic.title: Author Guidelines
topic.section:
The conference provides a set of Author Guidelines in About the Conference that cover the bibliographic and other formatting standards employed by the scheduled conference.

The authors may check the Call for Papers to better understand conference themes and topics; the Track Policies page to learn types of submissions desired; and the Conference Timeline to check the submission date. It is also suggested to browse published papers of previous conferences to obtain a clear idea of aspects that are not detailed by guidelines, if available.
